meanings.sent1: The nonparity in their salaries caused dissatisfaction among the employees.
meanings.sent2: The nonparity in opportunities for promotion led to resentment within the company.
meanings.sent3: The nonparity in dessert portions at the party left some guests feeling shortchanged.
meanings.sent4: The nonparity in attention given to each student was evident in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The nonparity in voting rights was a topic of discussion during the election.

meanings.definition: Not being on an equal level or status
meanings.sent1: She felt frustrated by the nonparity treatment she received compared to her colleagues.
meanings.sent2: The nonparity distribution of resources among the team members caused tension.
meanings.sent3: The nonparity seating arrangement at the event made for an awkward situation.
meanings.sent4: His nonparity position in the company hierarchy motivated him to work harder.
meanings.sent5: The nonparity recognition of their efforts left them feeling undervalued.

meanings.sent1: The nonparity in the distribution of workload created stress among the team members.
meanings.sent2: The nonparity in the allocation of funds raised concerns among the stakeholders.
meanings.sent3: The nonparity in the sizes of the sandwiches at the picnic caused some disappointment.
meanings.sent4: The nonparity in the number of vacation days granted to employees raised issues within the company.
meanings.sent5: The nonparity in the division of responsibilities led to inefficiencies in the project.
